entry.source: {F812}Regal voice\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256001}...So you have come thus far.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256002}Know this, assemblage of God's puppets{F801}and the pitiful son of man whom He{F801}has led astray...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Regal voice\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256001}...So you have come thus far.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256002}Know this, assemblage of God's puppets{F801}and the pitiful son of man whom He{F801}has led astray...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256003}I am the Demon Lord Lucifer.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256004}The humiliating slander of being called{F801}"evil" for flouting God's will, and{F801}subsequent banishment, shall be repaid.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256003}I am the Demon Lord Lucifer.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256004}The humiliating slander of being called{F801}"evil" for flouting God's will, and{F801}subsequent banishment, shall be repaid.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256005}For the dignity of we who live in chaos{F801}and the free will of humanity...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256005}For the dignity of we who live in chaos{F801}and the free will of humanity...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256006}I will not give this world over to{F801}"order."{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,204}{F87B,204,1,1,1}{F813,0,256006}I will not give this world over to{F801}"order."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}{F813,0,256007}We have vanquished Lucifer at last...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256008}It is victory forged by we two. Nothing{F801}remains to hinder our steps.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}{F813,0,256007}We have vanquished Lucifer at last...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256008}It is victory forged by we two. Nothing{F801}remains to hinder our steps.{F801}

entry.source: {F813,0,256011}{F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}With this, all this world's Filth will{F801}be cleansed.{F801}
entry.target: {F813,0,256011}{F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}With this, all this world's Filth will{F801}be cleansed.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}{F813,0,256012}It is time for the Great Abaddon to{F801}swallow Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256013}...And we are no exception. We, too,{F801}have brushed against Filth and been{F801}spattered with their blood.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}{F813,0,256012}It is time for the Great Abaddon to{F801}swallow Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,256013}...And we are no exception. We, too,{F801}have brushed against Filth and been{F801}spattered with their blood.{F801}
